article_title: A victory for the Constitution on healthcare
article_text:
Posted: January 07, 2015

In regards to the escapee on the evening of Dec. 27, we who live in the area of the Rosenberg DPS offices are lucky that the bad judgment of the DPS Trooper didn’t turn into a home invasion or worse. more »

og.description: A federal judge just ruled that Congress never appropriated the funding for the cost-sharing reductions in Obamacare.
og.title: A victory for the Constitution on healthcare
